amendment.description: Amendment instructs the commission to review the impact of regulation on wages as part of their retrospective review.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to direct the Commission to highlight the role regulations have on wage stagnation and income inequality by examining the negative impact of regulations on wages, including wages for minimum wage and part-time workers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
